com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon

Class SourceRconMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.core.NettyMessenger<SourceRconRequest,SourceRconResponse>
      • com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon.SourceRconMessenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Messenger<SourceRconRequest,SourceRconResponse>, ConfigurationSupport, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @MessengerProperties(optionClass=SourceRconOptions.class)
public final class SourceRconMessenger
extends NettyMessenger<SourceRconRequest,SourceRconResponse>

    RCON Messenger

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated(InetSocketAddress address)
        Checks if the specified InetSocketAddress has been previously authenticated.
        Note: This does not check the validity of the Credentials registered to the address.
        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress to check
        Returns:
        true if the address has been previously authenticated.

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(InetSocketAddress address,
                       boolean connectionsOnly)
        Invalidate the credentials and/or the Channel's associated with it
        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress to invalidate
        connectionsOnly - true if we should only also invalidate the connections associated with the specified address, credentials will remain valid.
